name: Cartographer Cannon
description:
Description:

Cartographer Cannon is a cute puzzle game where you shoot to move. Nudge rafts, shoot rocks, and pick up maps to advance through increasingly difficult levels. 

Credits:

Thank you to my friends and family for beta testing, my dad for programming help, and my brother for helping with music creation. Also thanks to Juhani Junkala for the creation of the "Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" which I used.

Controls:
  • LEFT/RIGHT to rotate
  • SPACE to shoot
  • C to toggle cam in level select
  • M to toggle music
  • Z to undo
  • X to restart
Download:

Downloading is recommended, but only available for windows. Otherwise, play in the browser, there are some undo bugs that could lock your inputs, however, you can just reload the page and your progress will have been saved.
